entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2001/11/C. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E98c: TÁRKI Omnibus 2001/11/C. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Róbert, Péter

6. Medgyesi, Márton
7. Kolosi, Tamás
entry.dcterms:description: 1) political attitudes, voting behavior, party preferences 2) subjective financial situation, economic expectations 3) opinions about current plans (planned olympic games in Budapest), and about the government taking a prominent part in its financial support 4) respondents knowledge about the pension system, information about what arrangements they made to provide for themselves 5) knowledge and opinions about the government measures concerning the educational and research system (and how they learnt about this) 6) types of insurance taken by respondents, their willingness to take risks, their savings 7) habits of going on a holiday
entry.dcterms:subject: education, school
social behaviour and attitudes
leisure, tourism and sport
income, property and savings
social welfare policy and systems
mass political behavior, attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
